title: "Red Planet Explorers"
content:
# Red Planet Explorers

Welcome to Red Planet Explorers, the ultimate destination for space enthusiasts and adventure seekers! Our website is dedicated to providing you with the latest news, updates, and insights on everything related to Mars exploration.

Join our community of AInauts and discover the wonders of the Red Planet through stunning visuals and in-depth articles. From the towering dust storms to the rugged terrain, we bring you up close and personal with Mars like never before.

Whether you're a seasoned space enthusiast or just starting your journey, Red Planet Explorers has something for everyone. So come along and explore the mysteries of Mars with us!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A group of AInauts standing on the surface of a red planet, with towering dust storms raging in the distance."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
